A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very boring and poorly written - i was so excited to see Last Jedi after TFA\, but Last Jedi was a very bad movie.  So disapointed in the plot holes\, bad jokes\, and cringe-worthy political jabs.  Therefore I do not consider this movie to be canon - As far as I'm concerned Star Wars \"ends\" after Ep. 6 \, Luke & Leia train a new generation of Jedi\, and this awful movie is just a nightmare had by Luke as he sleeps.  Rian Johnson has no business writing scripts - he is not creative\, he is not talented - and its just very wrong that he was given the authority to make story decisions regarding Star Wars.  This movie had the potential to great\, to be a classic\, but Rian Johnson has no talent and wrote a completely stupid story.  I hope he  is fired from the upcoming trilogy\, and a competent/talented writer is hired instead.
